item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: DELANEY'S (in the Tap Room)

I like Delaney's because they have (literally) dozens of beers to choose from, in addition to a great selection of other delicious things (I counted at least 20 scotches!). They're a great place to unwind at and eat some good bar food with buddies.

Right now the special is $1 PBR (Pabst Blue Ribbon) but hopefully food specials to follow as well! The manager I met with said that she'd speak to the owner for us (Go Amanda! We're rooting for you!)

Delaney's website: http://www.delaneysta...

Your contact for this event is Devorah 203-314-4329

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

(Bring a friend!)
item.name: DELANEY'S 1/7/08 happy hour!
